text:
:crown: *Content, content, content.* We can all agree that relevant high quality content is a core part of ranking on the top spots of Google.

Where I see folks disagree is over the nuance of what "quality content" means.
• Are you meeting the searcher's intent?
• Does your website convey enough E-A-T (expertise, authority, trustworthiness)?
• Can people with eye disabilities easily navigate through your site architecture?
• When do custom illustrations and video embeds actually matter?
• Is your content doing a good job serving the range of "hidden intents" that surround your topic?
Now imagine trying to do this at scale for hundreds of different keyword categories :cold_sweat:

We're excited to host guest speakers <@U01RMAGGS76> and Tyler Tafelsky from The Gray Dot Company, an adaptable group of senior SEO advisors, for a discussion on "<https://clearscope.us6.list-manage.com/track/click?u=007c9261dfa84f8983bd7d6de&id=c800634200&e=646b32ed2c|Elevating Content to Rise Above the Competition>".

:spiral_note_pad: *Details:*
** Title:* Elevating Content to Rise Above the Competition
** Speakers:* <https://clearscope.us6.list-manage.com/track/click?u=007c9261dfa84f8983bd7d6de&id=d3c0db7a07&e=646b32ed2c|Tory Gray>, CEO at <https://clearscope.us6.list-manage.com/track/click?u=007c9261dfa84f8983bd7d6de&id=20ecd7ada0&e=646b32ed2c|The Gray Dot Company> & <https://clearscope.us6.list-manage.com/track/click?u=007c9261dfa84f8983bd7d6de&id=9fc925b73e&e=646b32ed2c|Tyler Tafelsky>, Director of Content Strategy at <https://clearscope.us6.list-manage.com/track/click?u=007c9261dfa84f8983bd7d6de&id=c4215e2e84&e=646b32ed2c|The Gray Dot Company>
** Date & time:* Thursday, March 24th, 11:00 AM US Central Time
** Zoom registration page:* <https://us02web.zoom.us/webinar/register/7516473730098/WN_w65MH9QrS42ONm8TlYIQTw>
** Who should attend:* Attend this webinar for a comprehensive look at all the elements you can be using to bolster your content quality. We'll walk through all the fundamentals of relevant content and give you a glimpse at the list of content improvements we've seen have a higher impact on SEO.

RSVP to attend live OR receive the webinar recording in your inbox if you can't make it :inbox_tray:

attachments.fallback: Zoom Video Communications: Welcome! You are invited to join a webinar: Elevating Content to Rise Above the Competition with Tory Gray and Tyler Tafelsky. After registering, you will receive a confirmation email about joining the webinar.
attachments.text: Join guest speakers Tory Gray and Tyler Tafelsky from The Gray Dot Company, an adaptable group of senior SEO advisors, for a discussion on "Elevating Content to Rise Above the Competition". The webinar will comprehensively cover how an in-depth content workflow looks, from start to finish. You will walk away from this webinar learnings things like: * How to look at the fundamentals (what you do, who you're talking to, and why) * In-depth competitor analysis (inspecting SERPs for gaps, understanding how competitors are positioning) * Writing content to improve PAA answer box and rich snippet potential * Framing your content for originality and trustworthiness And a big ol' list of things that Tory & Tyler seeing working today (eg. hidden intent, accessibility, video transcripts & more). About Tory Gray: CEO and Principal SEO Consultant at The Gray Dot Company, Tory Gray is a leader in the SEO space who brings a refreshing perspective and inspiring way of looking at things. Tory is a passionate mentor for WTSEO and offers vast experience in all things growth strategy. Follow Tory Gray on Twitter: <https://twitter.com/torylynne> About Tyler Tafelsky: With roots as an SEO writer and strategist, Tyler Tafelsky now directs content strategy and copywriting at The Gray Dot Company. Tyler thrives in both the analytical and creative side of SEO, especially when it comes to leading content creation. Follow Tyler Tafelsky on Twitter: <https://twitter.com/TylerTafelsky> About The Gray Dot Company: An adaptable group of senior SEO advisors with varied backgrounds in tech and content, The Gray Dot Company provides strategic guidance and consulting across many verticals, including SaaS and tech startups, non-profits, and regulated industries. Follow The Gray Dot Company on Twitter: <https://twitter.com/GrayDotCo> Want a taste of what you can expect from Clearscope webinars? Check out our YouTube channel to see past recordings: <https://www.youtube.com/c/clearscope>

text:
:wave: Howdy Campers!    I’m going to have a little fun next week talking about the :skull: *Death of Webinars* :skull:.

If you’re of the opinion that *Webinars must die*, then you might like this livestream I’m doing and would love your ideas on the show!

:headstone: The Definitive Webinar on the Death of Webinars :skull::skull_and_crossbones: *on March 28*: <https://vimeo.com/webinars/events/363f1980-9beb-42e2-b1e1-bc43b1cfa160>

text:
Hey friends :wave:

:sparkles: Your favourite summertime *search and content marketing focused conference*, *<https://moz.com/mozcon|MozCon>* is back IRL in *Seattle, WA July 11-13, 2022* and you're not gonna want to miss it.

:thought_balloon: Whether you're early in your career or a seasoned pro, working at an agency or working in-house, MozCon provides 3 days of highly actionable content from real practitioners to help you level up in SEO, search, content marketing, link building & PR, your career, and more. We've started to reveal our speaker lineup with more to come and hope to see some Superpath friends in the audience.

:admission_tickets: Early Bird tickets are on sale with only 250 available now through April 30th (or until sold out, whichever comes first).

:hugging_face: Thinking about bringing the whole team? Please reach out as we have Group pricing options available.

Hope to see you this July! :point_right: <http://pointmoz.com/mozcon|moz.com/mozcon>

text:
When you combine the Customer Journey with Joseph Campbell's Journey of the Hero, this is the progression.

Subscribe to my Stellar Platforms Newsletter to watch my on-demand masterclass on <https://caelanhuntress.com/masterclass/journey/?utm_source=slack&utm_medium=forum&utm_campaign=superpath|The Customer Journey of the Hero>.

text:
Hi everyone! Nice to connect with you here! Do you find yourself having more and more unproductive meetings?

We're building <http://assembo.ai|assembo.ai> :rocket:— an AI-powered automatic meeting note-taking App that helps teams to prepare, engage, and get more out of meetings in less time! Would you like to be added to Assembo's newsletter email list? You could just PM me your email if you're interested!
<https://www.assembo.ai/>
